GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Prompt to fetch the application history of the student
GenAiPromptTemplate.masterLabel: Prompt to fetch the application history of the student

templateVersions.content:
{!$Input:Contact.Name}
{!$Flow:Flow2.Prompt} Based on the above flow output
The output should be in the below format {contactname} received an offer the {Offer Status Date}, the current status is {Offer Status} and the assessment result is {Assessment Result}.
Below is some additional information about the Application: Instruction " If there is no data in any of the attributes below don't include that attribute in the additional information section" Is International Application : Application Stage : Program Name: Term Name:

{!$Input:Contact.Name}
{!$Flow:Flow2.Prompt} Based on the above flow output
The output should be in the below format, {contactname} received an offer the {Offer Status Date}, the current status is {Offer Status} and the assessment result is {Assessment Result}.
Below is some additional information about the Application: Instruction " If there is no data in any of the attributes below don't include that attribute in the additional information section" Is International Application : Application Stage : Program Name: Term Name:
If the response contains this sentence "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact" then give the output as "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact"

{!$Input:Contact.Name}
{!$Flow:Flow2.Prompt} Based on the above flow output
The output should be in the below format, don't include any filler words. Strictly follow the below format. {contactname} received an offer the {Offer Status Date}, the current status is {Offer Status} and the assessment result is {Assessment Result}.
Below is some additional information about the Application: Instruction " If there is no data in any of the attributes below don't include that attribute in the additional information section" Is International Application : Application Stage : Program Name: Term Name:
If the response contains this sentence "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact" then only show the output as "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact"

{!$Input:Contact.Name}
{!$Flow:Flow2.Prompt} Based on the above flow output
If the response contains this sentence "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact" then give the output as "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact" Else give the output in the below format
Format "The output should be in the below format, {contactname} received an offer the {Offer Status Date}, the current status is {Offer Status} and the assessment result is {Assessment Result}.
Below is some additional information about the Application: Instruction " If there is no data in any of the attributes below don't include that attribute in the additional information section" Is International Application : Application Stage : Program Name: Term Name: "

{!$Input:Contact.Name}
{!$Flow:Flow_To_Fetch_Application_Linked_To_The_Student.Prompt} Based on the above flow output
The output should be in the below format, {contactname} received an offer the {Offer Status Date}, the current status is {Offer Status} and the assessment result is {Assessment Result}.
Below is some additional information about the Application: Instruction " If there is no data in any of the attributes below don't include that attribute in the additional information section" Is International Application : Application Stage : Program Name: Term Name:
If the response contains this sentence "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact" then give the output as "There is No Application Record Associated this Contact"
